Melanie Ward MP
Cowdenbeath and Kirkcaldy
Melanie Ward
Scottish Labour MP for Cowdenbeath and Kirkcaldy
About Me
As your MP, I’m committed to the change we promised you, to making sure no one in Cowdenbeath and Kirkcaldy has to battle a broken system. Our community has a proud heritage, built on hard work and resilience, and I will strive to give us a future we can be just as proud of. That means rejuvenating our local economy, protecting our children in an increasingly online world, supporting families who care for loved ones with Special Education Needs and Disabilities, and ensuring everyone has access to the services they deserve.
Service has defined my life. For over two decades, I’ve worked to tackle poverty and lead in international crises. I’ve never shied away from tough fights. Today, I bring that tenacity to Westminster, driven by the stories of the people I represent. Real change isn’t just a promise; it’s the work we’re doing now, together, to build a better future.
Contact me:
If you are a constituent and want to get in touch about a problem I may be able to help you with, or have a question about a policy issue, please feel free to get in touch by email at [email protected] or send a message on Facebook.

The website from which you got to this page is protected by Cloudflare. Email addresses on that page have been hidden in order to keep them from being accessed by malicious bots. You must enable Javascript in your browser in order to decode the e-mail address.
If you have a website and are interested in protecting it in a similar way, you can sign up for Cloudflare.
